game.name: Tower Hunter: Erza's Trial
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Tower Hunter: Erza’s Trial contains core elements of roguelite games, presented in a toon render style. The player explores a mysterious tower with Erza, vanquishes mutant monsters and defeats bosses to acquire a Hunter’s License and become the most powerful Battle Maiden.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tower Hunter: Erza’s Trial contains core elements of roguelite games, presented in a toon render style. The player explores a mysterious tower with Erza, vanquishes mutant monsters and defeats bosses to acquire a Hunter’s License and become the most powerful Battle Maiden.

reviewHighlights.text: 내가 생각하는 전형적인 양산형 플스게임... 컨텐츠가 너무 없고 맵도 똑같고 괜히 시작했다 생각함. 다른 리뷰들처럼, 카타나, 쉴드, 방패말고는 쓸만한게 없다고 봄. 다른거 쓰면 진행이 더느려짐... (대쉬로 평캔이 가능해서 평평평 대쉬 평평평 대쉬 로 후딜레이 잡는게...
